text: Liga I (previously called Divizia A) is the top division association football league in Romania. == Club 2017–18 == * Poli Timișoara * Astra Giurgiu * Botoșani * Cluj * Concordia Chiajna * Universitatea Craiova * Politehnica Iași * Dinamo București * Steaua Bucureşti * Gaz Metan Mediaș * Juventus București * Sepsi Sfântu Gheorghe * Viitorul Constanța * Voluntari == Results == Season Winner Runner-up Third Place Note 2006–07 Dinamo București (18) Steaua București CFR Cluj 2007–08 CFR Cluj (1) Steaua București Rapid Bucureşti 2008–09 Unirea Urziceni (1) FC Timișoara Dinamo București 2009–10 CFR Cluj (2) Unirea Urziceni FC Vaslui 2010–11 Oțelul Galați (1) FC Timișoara FC Vaslui 2011–12 CFR Cluj (3) FC Vaslui Steaua Bucureşti 2012–13 Steaua București (24) Pandurii Târgu Jiu Petrolul Ploieşti 2013–14 Steaua București (25) Astra Giurgiu Petrolul Ploiești 2014–15 Steaua București (26) ASA Târgu Mureş CFR Cluj 2015–16 Astra Giurgiu (1) Steaua București Pandurii Târgu Jiu 2016–17 Viitorul Constanța (1) Steaua București Astra Giurgiu 2017–18 Tbd Tbd Tbd == Other websites == * Romanian Professional Football League official website * Results and statistics since 1932 == References == Category:Football leagues in Europe Category:Football in Romania Category:1909 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Romania Category:Sports organizations of Romania
title: Liga I
